characterDescription: Notum is a honorspren and captain of the ship, Honor's Path, that Shallan, Adolin, Kaladin, and Azure embark upon in their crossing through Shadesmar.

characterDetails.Appearance:
He glows a soft blue-white, and wears an outdated - but sharp - naval uniform, which is part of his substance. His beard is of a cut with the chin shaved, almost like a Horneater, but with a thin mustache and a sculpted line of hair that runs from it up his cheeks and blends into his sideburns.
Notum has also appeared as an Alethi man, sturdy and tall, with close-cropped hair. While he did have a beard somewhat like that of a Horneater, with prominent sideburns running down his cheeks, he maintained that additional thin mustache. It, along with his simple clothing, was all part of him.
characterDetails.Characteristics:
In that appearance as an Alethi man, he has a militaristic attitude.
He rides a strange spren that looks like a horse, but more graceful and supple, with long legs and a neck that bends in a way no physical spine can. It has large eyes but seemingly no mouth, and its hair waves in a phantom wind, like long glowing ribbons.
